execution_plan.description: Retrieve product identifiers and their prices from the goods catalog.
Retrieve sold items with their receipt reference from the items table (each row represents one sold item occurrence).
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt AS receipt_number, Item AS item_id FROM items;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve receipt numbers with their sale dates.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber AS receipt_number, Date FROM receipts;
